resources.string:
Hello, My Name is Jason. 

I am a quality-oriented professional who has been consistently praised as hard-working by my co-workers and management. Over the course of my 3-year career, I have deployed a skill set directly relevant to the Software Developer Field, including application development and preventative maintenance. 

Overall, I have consistently demonstrated critical thinking, problem-solving and teamwork abilities in every aspect of my Software Support Coordinator / Developer role at Gordon Food Service
